actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, with respect to forward contracts.
short_title: Forward Contract Bankruptcy Act Amendments of 1983

summary.text: Forward Contract Bankruptcy Act Amendments of 1983 - Amends title 11 (Bankruptcy) of the United States Code to define for the purposes of such title: (1) "forward contract" as a contract (other than a commodity contract) for the purchase, sale, or transfer of a commodity, or product or byproduct thereof with a maturity date more than two days after the date the contract is entered into; and (2) "forward contract merchant" as a person whose business consists in whole or in part of entering into forward contracts as or with merchants in commodities.

titles.title: Forward Contract Bankruptcy Act Amendments of 1983
A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, with respect to forward contracts.
